channel.title: Need help adding shop
channel.description:
okay here is what ive done:
[code]shop = 21 @bla@Barrows Shop 1 1 4717 100 4719 100 4720 100 4722 100 6570 1000 6585 1000 4725 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100[/code] i did that in shops.cfg that is fine ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ then i went to autospawn.cfg and did this at the last "shop keepers" NPCID XCORD YCORD range stuff>>>>>>>>>Hight walk style.. [code]spawn = 1699 2931 3481 0 0 0 0 0 2 Barrows_Shop[/code]
thats my error ^^^^^^

item.title: Need help adding shop
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Its Shop(SPACE)=(SPACE)#(TAB)name(TAB) etc.
Did you add the wanneshop = # in client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding shop
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

okay here is what ive done:

shop = 21	@bla@Barrows Shop				1	1	4717	100	4719	100	4720	100	4722	100	6570	1000	6585	1000	4725	100	4726	100	4728	100	4730	100	4732	100	4734	100	4736	100	4738	100	4745	100	4747	100	4749	100	4751	100	4708	100	4710	100	4712	100	4714	100

i did that in shops.cfg
that is fine ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
then i went to autospawn.cfg and did this at the last “shop keepers”
NPCID XCORD YCORD range stuff>>>>>>>>>Hight walk style…

spawn = 1699    2931    3481    0       0       0       0       0       2       Barrows_Shop

thats my error ^^^^^^

Read full topic
